title: Private Furnished room /apartment for rent $400 weekly
posting_body: ['Furnished room for rent in private residential house.', 'Private entrance, kitchen and bathroom.', 'Fully furnished', 'All utilities included', 'Separate parking', 'Has a decent size room with another smaller room.', 'Apartment or efficiency style.', 'On Polk Street in Marietta.', ' Close to Marietta High School, Kennestone and Wellstar Hospital Systems, Kennesaw Mountain, and Marietta Square.', 'All utilities included with free Wifi.', ' Rooms are furnished with queen bed and dresser', '$400 weekly', '$600 deposit required', 'Looking for clean, responsible, professional nonsmokers, non alcoholics, or drug abusers.', ' Good landlord, simple terms.', 'Long term renter preferred.', 'If interested, call', 'show contact info', 'Available now', 'Ask for pictures']
